citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:39 AM on 02-
May-2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by knocking on the facility door and calling the phone numbers
listed on the account. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of
the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:39 AM on 02-
May-2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by knocking on the facility door and calling the phone numbers 
listed on the account. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of 
the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
